'''Farewell of Snezhnaya''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 1.1]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2020-11-11 10:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2020-12-01 15:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Childe" [[Tartaglia]] ({{Hydro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Kätzlein Cocktail" [[Diona]] ({{Cryo}}), "Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean" [[Beidou]] ({{Electro}}), and "Eclipsing Star" [[Ningguang]] ({{Geo}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* After the conclusion of this event, the 4-star character "Kätzlein Cocktail" [[Diona]] ({{Cryo}}) will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" from [[Version 1.2]] onwards.
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
